Package it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils

Class CalculatorTeacherOwnership

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.utils.CalculatorTeacherOwnership
public class CalculatorTeacherOwnership extends Object
A class to manage teacher ownership in the game: if a player has the highest number of students of a specific color on its dining table, player owns the teacher of that specific color

    protected void
    addTeacherToPlayerWithHighestNumberOfStudentOfColor(Player currentPlayer, Player oldOwner, Teacher teacher)
    Applies normalOwnershipCondition method on current player and old owner of the teacher
    void
    evaluate(Player player, ColorCharacter color, List<Player> players)
    Given a list of players evaluate the teacher's owner
    protected Player
    getNewPlayerOwnerOfTeacherOfColor(Teacher t)
    Given a teacher compare each player's number of students on the dining table according to the teacher's color, returns the teacher's new owner (the player with most students on the dining table)
    protected Player
    getPlayerWithTeacherOfColor(ColorCharacter color)
    Given a student color, compare all players and return the player who has the teacher of that color
    protected Teacher
    getTeacherOfColorFromPlayerOwner(ColorCharacter color)
    If the condition of teacher's ownership is true, move a teacher from old owner to new owner, if teacher has no old owner, creates the teacher to give to the new owner.
    protected void
    normalOwnershipCondition(Player oldOwner, Teacher teacher)
    Teacher ownership condition for a player: highest number of students on the teacher's color dining table if old owner still has the teacher ownership condition, keep the teacher on its school If another player has teacher ownership condition, move teacher from old owner's school to new owner school

    • evaluate

      public void evaluate(Player player, ColorCharacter color, List<Player> players)
      Given a list of players evaluate the teacher's owner
      Parameters:
      player - current player
      color - teacher to evaluate 's color
      players - Game players list

    • addTeacherToPlayerWithHighestNumberOfStudentOfColor

      protected void addTeacherToPlayerWithHighestNumberOfStudentOfColor(Player currentPlayer, Player oldOwner, Teacher teacher)
      Applies normalOwnershipCondition method on current player and old owner of the teacher
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - player currently playing
      oldOwner - player who has the teacher before this method call
      teacher - teacher to evaluate the owner

    • normalOwnershipCondition

      protected void normalOwnershipCondition(Player oldOwner, Teacher teacher)
      Teacher ownership condition for a player: highest number of students on the teacher's color dining table if old owner still has the teacher ownership condition, keep the teacher on its school If another player has teacher ownership condition, move teacher from old owner's school to new owner school
      Parameters:
      oldOwner - old owner of the teacher
      teacher - teacher to compare

    • getNewPlayerOwnerOfTeacherOfColor

      protected Player getNewPlayerOwnerOfTeacherOfColor(Teacher t)
      Given a teacher compare each player's number of students on the dining table according to the teacher's color, returns the teacher's new owner (the player with most students on the dining table)
      Parameters:
      t - teacher
      Returns:
      player that is the teacher's new owner

    • getTeacherOfColorFromPlayerOwner

      protected Teacher getTeacherOfColorFromPlayerOwner(ColorCharacter color)
      If the condition of teacher's ownership is true, move a teacher from old owner to new owner, if teacher has no old owner, creates the teacher to give to the new owner.
      Parameters:
      color - teacher color
      Returns:
      teacher to move, or to create

    • getPlayerWithTeacherOfColor

      protected Player getPlayerWithTeacherOfColor(ColorCharacter color)
      Given a student color, compare all players and return the player who has the teacher of that color
      Parameters:
      color - student color to compare
      Returns:
      player with teacher of that color
